text: Crans-Montana is a municipality of the district Sierre in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Chermignon, Mollens, Montana and Randogne merged into the new municipality of Crans- Montana. Crans-Montana is a ski resort that was created through the fusion of the two centers of Crans and Montana. It belonged to six municipalities (Chermignon, Lens, Icogne, Mollens, Montana and Randogne). Four of those municipalities merged to form the new municipality of Crans-Montana. ==Gallery== File:Crans Montana.jpg|Crans-Montana File:Montana VS.JPG|Montana == References == ==Other websites== * Official website * Crans-Montana ski resort Category:2017 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Sierre Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland Category:Villages in Valais
title: Crans-Montana
